data.text: Mɛto Awurade adɔe ho dwom daa daa;
Mɛka se wʼadɔe no tim hɔ daa nyinaa,
Wokae se, “Mene onipa a mayi no no ayɛ apam;
‘Mɛma wʼase atim hɔ daa
Awurade, ɔsorosorofo kamfo wʼanwonwade,
Na hena na ɔne wo Awurade sɛ wɔ ɔsoro hɔ?
Akronkronfo agyinatufo mu, wosuro Onyankopɔn;
Asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn, hena na ɔte sɛ wo?
Wudi po a ɛworo no so;
Wodwerɛw Rahab sɛ atɔfo no mu baako;
Ɔsoro wɔ wo, na asase nso wɔ wo;
Wobɔɔ atifi ne anafo.
Tumi ayɛ wo basa ma;
Wʼahengua no fapem yɛ trenee ne atɛntrenee;
Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔasua sɛnea wɔbɔ wo abodin,
Wogye wɔn ani wɔ wo din mu da mu nyinaa;
Wone wɔn anuonyam ne ahoɔden,
Ampa ara, yɛn kyɛm wɔ Awurade,
Da bi wokasaa wɔ anisoadehu mu,
Mahu Dawid, me somfo;
Me nsa bɛwowaw no;
Ɔtamfo biara renhyɛ no sɛ ontua tow;
Mɛdwerɛw nʼatamfo wɔ nʼanim
Me nokware adɔe bɛka ne ho,
Mɛtrɛw nʼahye mu akosi po so,
Ɔbɛfrɛ me aka se, ‘Wone mʼagya,
Mɛyɛ no mʼabakan,
Mɛma mʼadɔe a mewɔ ma no no atena hɔ daa,
Mɛma nʼase atim afebɔɔ,
“Sɛ ne mmabarima po me mmara
sɛ wobu mʼahyɛde so
ɛno de mede abaa bɛtwe wɔn aso wɔ wɔn bɔne ho
Nanso merennyae mʼadɔe a meyɛ ma no no
Meremmu mʼapam no so
Menam me din kronkron no so aka ntam prɛko,
meremma nʼase ntɔre da
ebetim hɔ daa te sɛ ɔsram,
Nanso woapo no, woapa nʼakyi,
Woagu apam a wo ne wo somfo pamee no,
Woabubu nʼafasu nyinaa
Wɔn a wotwa mu wɔ hɔ nyinaa fow no fa;
Woama nʼatamfo nsa nifa so;
Woama nʼafoa ayɛ ɔkwa,
Wode nʼanuonyam aba awiei
Woatwa ne mmerantebere nna so
Awurade, enkosi da bɛn? Na wode wo ho behintaw?
Kae sɛnea me nkwanna twa mu ntɛm so.
Hena na ɔbɛtena ase a ɔrenwu da?
Awurade, ɛhe na wo tete adɔe kɛse no wɔ,
Kae, Awurade, sɛnea wɔadi wo somfo ho fɛw
Awurade, akutiabɔ a wʼatamfo de adi fɛw
Ayeyi nka Awurade daa!
